name: ODEForwardPlugin
description: Listens for J2735 messages and realtime forwards them to ODE.

configuration.description: Sample of incoming messages to forward (1 = forward every message)
(Cond: ForwardMSG == True) Topic to use for forwarding BSM
(Cond: ForwardMSG == True) Topic to use for forwarding SPaT
IP address to be used for KAFKA broker
Port number to be used for KAFKA broker
